author: stack
msg: Minor edit fix to  hirb help

author: etnu
msg: Created more useful Uri abstractions than the built in java.net.URI. This facilitates disassembling and reconstructing uris in a more flexible manner than the ad-hoc parsing being done currently.

One missing piece of functionality at the moment is the ability to set raw, unencoded query strings. This will be a temporary barrier to using this code in signed fetch and oauth due to the encoding requirements that differ from java.net.URLEncoder.

author: linsun
msg: allow a user to click a plugin to see plugin metadata in assembly listServer page and replace some hardcoded values
